articles.title: Street-style photographer: Leong Su Shan - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Leong Su Shan could very well be Singapore’s first international street portrait photographer – and her snaps have graced magazines such as Vogue. Meet her in this week’s instalment of Creative Capital.

articles.title: National powerlifter overcomes fatigue from F&B work, calluses and illness to eye a 7th gold medal in the sport - TODAY
articles.description: SINGAPORE — National powerlifter Matthias Yap pushed his way through calluses and illness, as well as regularly training while juggling a full time job, to "lift" himself into podium chances as the second seed for the Southeast Asian Cup.
